name: Clown Rat Egg Hunt
description:
You are a clown. A rat has tasked you with finding an egg. Go do it.

Made in about three hours for the Low Effort Jam 10.

-

Graphics:

Omega Modern by finalbossblues
"Girl with a basket of eggs" by Joachim Beuckelaer

Audio:

"VGMA Challenge - July 3rd" by Abstraction
"Confirm Style 2" by ObsydianX
